oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Dolly Parton and Emmylou Harris Radio Special: Together - Side 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording is of the radio special: Together. Together features Dolly Parton (entertainer) and Emmylou Harris (entertainer) discussion and performance recordings. Product was edited and produced by Warner brothers Records Incorporated. Tape is part two of two.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Dolly Parton; Emmylou Harris
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Emmylou Harris discusses how music can be a release -- (00:26) Satan's Jewel Crown (Emmylou Harris) -- (03:23) Harris discusses why she chose "Satan's Jewel Crown," and Dolly Parton praises spirital music -- (04:30) Here, There and Everywhere (Emmylou Harris) -- (08:22) Parton reflects on the story of a child when discussing "Shattered Image" -- (09:04) Shattered Image (Dolly Parton) -- (11:18) Parton and Harris discuss how they had initially struggled in Nashville -- (13:06) One of These Days (Dolly Parton) -- (16:02) Parton and Harris reflect on how they view the future, and their upcoming intentions -- (18:11) Unidentified outro tune ([Unidentified]) -- (18:29) Parton expresses her interest to continue work with Harris, and Harris and Parton reflect on creating albums -- (20:11) Together Again (Emmylou Harris)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Harris, Emmylou; Parton, Dolly; Parton, Dolly, 1946-;
